alert.note: Alert for Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 2:34PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sumter County through 315 PM EDT... At 234 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wildwood, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wildwood, Lake Panasoffkee, Center Hill, Coleman, Adamsville, Sumterville and Oxford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central Florida.
